popt4jlib.MSSC

Class GMeansMTClusterer.GMClustererAux

  • java.lang.Object
    • popt4jlib.MSSC.GMeansMTClusterer.GMClustererAux
  • Enclosing class:
    GMeansMTClusterer

    class GMeansMTClusterer.GMClustererAux
extends java.lang.Object
    nested auxiliary class to the GMeansMTClusterer class implementing the hard 2-step process of K-Means clustering, taking into account constraints on vectors that must not be moved (if they exist), and requirements for non-null clusters as well. Clearly not part of the public API.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2018

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

      • go1

        private void go1()
          throws ParallelException
        the main method, implementing both steps in classical K-Means clustering, namely the vector assignment, and the centers update phase.
        Throws:
        ParallelException - -can never really throw this exception, but compiler thinks so.
